name: take_loan
attributes: # [doc = " NFT を担保に差し入れ、貸付金を受け取る  "]
# [doc = " （`collateral_nft_account` の owner チェックを全く行っていないため、  "]
# [doc = "  攻撃者が他人の NFT を担保として差し入れて不正に融資を受けたり、  "]
# [doc = "  融資後に担保を引き揚げて資産を奪うことが可能です）"]
body: let cpi_accounts = Transfer { from : ctx . accounts . collateral_nft_account . to_account_info () , to : ctx . accounts . pool_nft_account . to_account_info () , authority : ctx . accounts . borrower . to_account_info () , } ;
transfer (CpiContext :: new (ctx . accounts . token_program . to_account_info () , cpi_accounts) , 1 ,) ? ;
let pool = & mut ctx . accounts . pool_lamports . to_account_info () ;
let borrower = & mut ctx . accounts . borrower . to_account_info () ;
* * pool . lamports . borrow_mut () = pool . lamports () . checked_sub (loan_amount) . ok_or (ErrorCode :: InsufficientPoolFunds) ? ;
msg ! ("Loan of {} lamports granted to {} using collateral {}" , loan_amount , ctx . accounts . borrower . key () , ctx . accounts . collateral_nft_account . key ()) ;

fields.name: collateral_nft_account
fields.attribute: # [doc = " CHECK: collateral_nft_account.owner == Token プログラム の検証を行っていない"] # [account (mut)]

fields.name: pool_nft_account
fields.attribute: # [doc = " CHECK: プール用 NFT アカウントの所有者検証を行っていない"] # [account (mut)]

fields.name: pool_lamports
fields.attribute: # [doc = " CHECK: プール資金アカウントの所有者検証を行っていない"] # [account (mut)]

fields.name: borrower
fields.attribute: # [doc = " 融資を受ける借り手（署名のみ検証）"] # [account (mut)]

fields.name: token_program
fields.attribute: # [doc = " SPL Token プログラム CPI 用"]
